channel.title: LineNotify on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in LineNotify on Some Title

item.title: Notify LINE of TV appearance information of your favorite entertainer
item.description: #Purpose I miss watching my favorite idol and comedians appear on TV, so I decided to notify them via LINE. #Overview Yahoo! TV G Guide was used to obtain information on TV programs, and to notify using LINE Notify. I set the program to run on Raspberrypi every morning at 9am. Acquisition of program information For example, in the case of a terrestrial program of “Chiaki Bimura” (Regional setting Tokyo), such a URL is used.
